```{r setup}
SciViews::R
```

```{r importation}
urchin_bio <- read("urchin_bio", package = "data.io", lang = "AN")
```

The following graphic is about an urchin

```{r graphique}
chart(data = urchin_bio, weight ~ origin %fill=% origin) +
  geom_violin()
```
